      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field patterns of bar magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Muster der 
Stabmagneten auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Configurations de champ magnétique des barres 
aimantées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Testes padrões do campo magnético de ímãs de 
barra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modelli del campo magnetico dei magneti di barra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπα μαγνητικών πεδίων των μαγνητών ράβδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelos del campo magnético de los imanes de 
barra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the magnetic field patterns for two bar magnets attracting (top) and repelling (bottom) each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die magnetischen
Muster für zwei Stabmagneten auffangen, die anziehen 
(Oberseite) und (abstoßen, Unterseite), die.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les configurations de 
champ magnétique pour deux barres aimantées attirant (dessus) et 
repoussant (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os testes padrões do 
campo magnético para dois ímãs de barra que atraem (alto) e que 
repelem (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i modelli del campo 
magnetico per due magneti di barra che attraggono (parte superiore) e 
che respingono (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πρότυπα μαγνητικών 
πεδίων για δύο μαγνήτες ράβδων που προσελκύουν (κορυφή) και που 
αποκρούουν (κατώτατο σημείο) ο ένας τον άλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los modelos del campo 
magnético para dos imanes de barra que atraen (tapa) y que rechazan 
(fondo).</string>
          </description>
